name: Guto Toolkit for Elementor Addons
author: GutoTheme

sections.description: Guto Toolkit is an Elementor Addons WordPress plugin that allows you to create 143+ unique layouts/widgets for your website.
sections.installation:
From the dashboard:

  1. Go to the WordPress Dashboard “Add New Plugin” section
  2. Search For “Guto Toolkit”
  3. Install, then Activate it

From control panel:

  1. Unzip (if it is zipped) and Upload guto-toolkit folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can I use the plugin without Elementor Page Builder?

No. You can’t use without Elementor since itâ€™s an addon for Elementor.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! It will work with any theme where Elementor works.
